name: 3-Ingredient Lemon Scones
author: purplepiscean
summary: These scones are so quick and simple. They only have three ingredients and produce deliciously light scones. The bubbles in the lemon soda make them rise. There is no need to rub butter as in the traditional scone recipe. Serve hot with whipped cream and berry jam.
directions: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Grease a baking sheet with cooking spray; lightly dust with flour
Sift self-rising flour into a large bowl
Combine lemon soda and cream and pour over the flour
Mix until dough is just combined
Turn dough out onto the prepared baking sheet
Flour your hands and gently pat dough into a large rectangle
Bake in the preheated oven until golden, 10 to 12 minutes
